name: BlowOut
description: Lead your team to a space station that has been overrun by mutated alien parasites. Take out the enemy before they have a chance to zero in on the station's control center and threaten colonized space. Secure the station by eliminating the alien threat.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Pentium 4 2.53 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce4 Ti 4600 or Radeon 9800 video card Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft DirectX 8.1 or higher
